## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ivstrideuse">IVStrideUse</a> - Keep track of one use of a strided induction variable.

The Expr member keeps track of the expression, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> is the actual user instruction of the operand, and &#39;OperandValToReplace&#39; is the operand of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> that is the use.

Definition at line 35 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/ivusers-h">IVUsers.h</a>.
